0.1.name: wordpress/easy-keyboard-shortcut-navigation
0.1.description:
Easy keyboard shortcut navigation adds javascripts to allow moving through posts on index, category and archive pages using the Pageup/Leftarrow and Pagedown/Rightarrow keys to skip to the next or previous page.

It also works to allow moving through adjacent post on single page using the Pageup/Leftarrow and Pagedown/Rightarrow keys to skip to the next or previous post.

中文介绍： http://www.zuibaike.com/2011/05/07/easy-keyboard-shortcut-navigation/

Features

  • View next post/posts with "Pagedown" or "Right", previous post/posts with "Pageup" or "Left"
  • When users are editing comment on single post page, the javascripts of Easy keyboard shortcut navigation will not work in order to avoid some conflicts.

Planned features:

  • Allow admins to define specified category to skip for post
